live_updates: This issue has been resolved, services have been restored to the area. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews have access to the site and have begun assessment and repair of the damaged lines.
Due to safety concerns city authorities have restricted access to the repair site until at least 6pm PT. Our field agents will be able to resume repairs at that time. We apologize for the delay.
